about.title: Welcome to the jungle !(★ ω ★)
about.intro: Welcome to the world of HappyWilderness, where fantasy meets fashion and every piece is a unique expression of originality and creativity.
about.team: Four different creative personalities, each completely different, we have joined together to offer you a diverse spectrum of designs and ideas that will captivate you and captivate your surroundings. You will thus become a source of inspiration for others.
about.philosophy: We believe that fashion should be more than just clothing - it should be an expression of your unique style and values. That's why we strive to create products that not only look great but also have a story.

originality.title: Originality
originality.description: Every design is unique and created with attention to detail.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use only premium materials that are comfortable to wear and last long.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: On-demand production means minimal waste and environmentally friendly approach.

about.story: If you've ever been to a magical place, you know very well that the magic of that place is not just in the physical presence itself, but in the fact that the place becomes part of you and that a connection with this place is formed within you, so you can return to it in your thoughts anytime and experience that enchantment over and over again. For this reason, we decided to create HappyWilderness to pass on a piece of this magic to you and help you create an extraordinary place from your own home where you will feel happy and fulfilled.
about.quote: We believe that fashion should be more than just clothing - it should be an expression of your unique style and values.

faq_subtitle: Frequently asked questions about our products, delivery and services
faq_shipping_wait_title: How long does production and delivery take?
faq_shipping_wait_content: Our products are made to order through Printful. Production takes 2-7 business days, then products are shipped to you. Total delivery time is 7-14 days from order.
faq_why_printful_content: We use Printful, which manufactures products on demand. This allows us to offer a wide selection of designs without storing inventory.
faq_tracking_title: When will I get a tracking number?
faq_tracking_content: You'll receive a tracking number by email as soon as production begins (usually within 24 hours of ordering).
faq_contact_text: If you haven't found the answer to your question, don't hesitate to contact us.
faq_shipping_title: What shipping services do you use?
faq_shipping_content: We use several shipping services by region: Packeta for Czech Republic and Slovakia (1-2 days, 2.99€), DHL Express for worldwide shipping (2-4 days, 8.99€) and UPS Standard as an economical alternative (3-5 days, 6.99€).
faq_delivery_time_title: What is the total delivery time?
faq_delivery_time_content: Total delivery time consists of production through Printful (5-7 days) and shipping. For Czech Republic and Slovakia it's 6-9 days, for worldwide 7-12 days.
faq_tracking_info_content: You'll receive a tracking number by email within 24 hours of ordering. You can track the production status and shipping until delivery.
faq_shipping_costs_content: Shipping costs 2.99€ for Czech Republic and Slovakia (Packeta), 8.99€ for worldwide shipping (DHL Express) or 6.99€ for economical worldwide shipping (UPS Standard).
faq_coming_soon_payments: Information about payment methods and security will be available soon...
faq_returns_title: How do returns and complaints work?
faq_returns_content: We provide a 30-day warranty on manufacturing. If the problem is on Printful's side (printing errors, wrong size, damage), we provide free replacement or refund. Customer pays shipping only if the problem is on their side.
faq_returns_process_title: How does the complaint process work?
faq_returns_process_content: 1. Contact us with photos and description of the problem. 2. We evaluate the situation and contact Printful. 3. After approval, we send you a replacement product or refund. 4. The entire process takes 3-7 business days.
faq_returns_photos_content: We need clear photos of the problem from different angles, order number and delivery date. Photos should show the entire product and detail of the problem.
faq_returns_shipping_content: If the problem is on Printful's side (printing errors, damage), we pay shipping. If the problem is on customer's side (wrong size, change of mind), customer pays shipping.
faq_returns_time_title: How long does complaint processing take?
faq_returns_time_content: Complaint evaluation takes 1-2 business days. After approval, we send replacement product within 5-7 business days or refund within 3-5 business days.

faq_gdpr_what_title: What is GDPR and how does it affect your data?
faq_gdpr_what_content: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) is a European regulation that protects your personal data. In accordance with GDPR, we inform you about how we process your data and what rights you have.
faq_gdpr_data_title: What data do we process about you?
faq_gdpr_data_content: We process your name, email, delivery address and order information. We need this data to process orders, communicate and send newsletters (only with your consent).
faq_gdpr_purpose_title: What do we use your data for?
faq_gdpr_purpose_content: We use your data for: processing orders, communicating order status, sending newsletters (with your consent), improving our services and complying with legal obligations.
faq_gdpr_rights_content: You have the right to: access your data, correct incorrect data, delete data, restrict processing, data portability and withdraw consent. You can exercise these rights by contacting us.
faq_gdpr_retention_title: How long do we keep your data?
faq_gdpr_retention_content: We keep order data for 5 years (accounting purposes). Newsletter data is kept until consent is withdrawn or 3 years from last activity. After this period, we securely delete the data.
faq_gdpr_contact_title: How can you contact us regarding GDPR?
faq_gdpr_contact_content: For questions regarding data protection, contact us at privacy@happywilderness.sk. We will respond within 30 days. You can also use the contact form on our website.
